children.text: A balance sheet is a financial statement that provides a snapshot of a company's financial condition at a specific moment in time, detailing its assets, liabilities, and shareholders' equity.

config.json:
[
  {
    "item_id": "ITM001",
    "item_title": "Cash and Cash Equivalents",
    "item_description": "Includes physical currency, bank accounts, and short-term investments that are easily convertible to known amounts of cash.",
    "item_category": "Current Assets",
    "balance": 75000.00,
    "last_year_balance": 80000.00
  },
  {
    "item_id": "ITM002",
    "item_title": "Short-Term Investments",
    "item_description": "Investments that are expected to be converted into cash within one year.",
    "item_category": "Current Assets",
    "balance": 20000.00,
    "last_year_balance": 15000.00
  },
  {
    "item_id": "ITM003",
    "item_title": "Accounts Receivable",
    "item_description": "Money owed to the company by customers for sales made on credit.",
    "item_category": "Current Assets",
    "balance": 60000.00,
    "last_year_balance": 55000.00
  },
  {
    "item_id": "ITM004",
    "item_title": "Inventory",
    "item_description": "The cost of products that are ready for sale.",
    "item_category": "Current Assets",
    "balance": 50000.00,
    "last_year_balance": 45000.00
  },
  {
    "item_id": "ITM005",
    "item_title": "Prepaid Expenses",
    "item_description": "Payments made for expenses which are not yet incurred.",
    "item_category": "Current Assets",
    "balance": 10000.00,
    "last_year_balance": 8000.00
  },
  {
    "item_id": "ITM006",
    "item_title": "Property, Plant, and Equipment",
    "item_description": "Long-term assets like buildings, machinery, and equipment used for operations.",
    "item_category": "Non-current Assets",
    "balance": 250000.00,
    "last_year_balance": 245000.00
  },
  {
    "item_id": "ITM007",
    "item_title": "Goodwill",
    "item_description": "An intangible asset that arises when a business is acquired for more than the fair value of its net identifiable assets.",
    "item_category": "Non-current Assets",
    "balance": 30000.00,
    "last_year_balance": 30000.00
  },
  {
    "item_id": "ITM008",
    "item_title": "Intangible Assets",
    "item_description": "Non-physical assets like patents, copyrights, and trademarks.",
    "item_category": "Non-current Assets",
    "balance": 40000.00,
    "last_year_balance": 35000.00
  },
  {
    "item_id": "ITM009",
    "item_title": "Accounts Payable",
    "item_description": "Obligations to pay for goods or services that have been acquired from suppliers on credit.",
    "item_category": "Current Liabilities",
    "balance": 30000.00,
    "last_year_balance": 25000.00
  },
  {
    "item_id": "ITM010",
    "item_title": "Short-Term Debt",
    "item_description": "Debt due to be paid within one year.",
    "item_category": "Current Liabilities",
    "balance": 20000.00,
    "last_year_balance": 15000.00
  },
  {
    "item_id": "ITM011",
    "item_title": "Accrued Liabilities",
    "item_description": "Expenses that have been incurred but not yet paid.",
    "item_category": "Current Liabilities",
    "balance": 10000.00,
    "last_year_balance": 12000.00
  },
  {
    "item_id": "ITM012",
    "item_title": "Long-Term Debt",
    "item_description": "Debt that is not due within the next year.",
    "item_category": "Non-current Liabilities",
    "balance": 100000.00,
    "last_year_balance": 95000.00
  },
  {
    "item_id": "ITM013",
    "item_title": "Deferred Tax Liabilities",
    "item_description": "Taxes that have been accrued but will not be paid for until a future period.",
    "item_category": "Non-current Liabilities",
    "balance": 15000.00,
    "last_year_balance": 14000.00
  },
  {
    "item_id": "ITM014",
    "item_title": "Share Capital",
    "item_description": "Funds raised by issuing shares in return for cash or other considerations.",
    "item_category": "Equity",
    "balance": 50000.00,
    "last_year_balance": 50000.00
  },
  {
    "item_id": "ITM015",
    "item_title": "Retained Earnings",
    "item_description": "The cumulative net income minus any dividends paid to shareholders.",
    "item_category": "Equity",
    "balance": 120000.00,
    "last_year_balance": 110000.00
  },
  {
    "item_id": "ITM016",
    "item_title": "Other Comprehensive Income",
    "item_description": "Revenues, expenses, gains, and losses that are excluded from net income on the income statement.",
    "item_category": "Equity",
    "balance": 5000.00,
    "last_year_balance": 3000.00
  }
]
